A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: You just took a giant Shit all over the first movie and rogue one.... Disney has fallen from grace with this flop of a movie.  The political nuances that escaped the first movie hasn't snuck into this movie. They have been splashed throughout the entire plot. Rose had absolutely no reason for being in the movie. Could shorten it by eliminating her scenes. Making Finn a wussy I understand because he was in Force awaken. Luke an ass was a little extreme. Making a love interested between Rey and Ren was so stupid if you were going for the feminist I don't need a man.  Just make them the exact opposites and leave it at that. PS killing him was a bold move which I did love.
